attributes.action: award a postumous knighthood on the late Brian Clough for his outstanding contribution to Football and in particular to his success at Derby County and Nottingham Forest. Brian Clough was also a strong advocate on social issues ie campaigned against pit closures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The late Brian Clough was an outstanding Manager of both Derby County and Nottingham Forest and in particular was highly successful in winning the League and the UEFA Cup twice whilst at Nottingham Forest.
Brian Clough was also a keen advocate of social issues ie Campaigned against pit closures.

rejection.details: sorry, we are no longer accepting posthumous honour petitions
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
